overview:
Shai is co-founder and CEO of Props, a startup that lets people show the world how awesome they are. Props users get recognition from people around them about their skills and can show it off to the world. People define themselves by their strong-suits, using Props people can both give attribution to people that deserve it, and get respect for the things they are good at.

In addition Shai is a network and information security advocate having spent over 10 years mainly at Check Point and RSA, in technical and business positions.

He also teaches entrepreneurship, security, and iOS development in several academic institutions and is the organizer of PizzApp.

Previously Shai was co-founder and CEO of ConTrust, a VC backed startup that dealt with user generated content moderation and security.

Shai holds a Bsc in computer science and an MBA.
